author: ktf
body:
This is the pull request which aligns CMSSW_7_2_X to CMSSW_7_1_X. The only merge conflicts were in the GT (where the 72X version has been picked up) and in `DataFormats/PatCandidates/src/TauPFSpecific.cc`, where again I picked up the `CMSSW_7_2_X` version.

List of pull requests which will be picked up by merging this:
- #4110
- #4001
- #3996
- #4140

title: Fix forward port 72x
